Package com.xrtb.common

Miscellaneous tools of the vidding engine are found here.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Campaign
    A class that implements a campaign.
    Compiler  
    Configuration
    The singleton class that makes up the Configuration object.
    Creative
    An object that encapsulates the 'creative' (the ad served up and it's attributes).
    HttpPostGet
    A class for sending HTTP post and get.
    JJS
    A class that encapsulates a Nashhorn script engine.
    Node
    A class that implements a parse-able node in the RTB object, and applies campaign logic.
    Template
    A class for defining multiple ADM fields on a per Exchange basis
    URIEncoder
    Simple uri encoder, made from the spec at http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2396.txt

Package com.xrtb.common Description

Miscellaneous tools of the vidding engine are found here.
Author:
Ben M. Faul
